title: How to set the port of "Quick connections"？（v1.77.1）
author: bytefish163
body_snippet:
`mRemoteNG version: 1.77.1.27654. `
`Operating System and version:  20H2 of Windows 10 professional.`

I set the port number in the “Default connection property” to 22222, In quick connections, type 192.168.1.222, but it didn't work! 
Error infomation:  Connection to "192.168.1.222" via "SSH2" established by user "hp_g4" (Description: ""; User Field: "")
[mRemoteNG’s documentation ](https://mremoteng.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user_interface/default_connection_properties.html#default-connecti...

iterations.description: The Quick Connect feature supports specifying a custom port via the connection string (e.g., host:port), but the documentation currently states that only default ports are used, leading to user confusion.
